can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>Migrating away from prefilled responses</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h3>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Starting with Claude 4.6 models, prefilled responses on the last assistant turn are no longer supported. Model intelligence and instruction following has advanced such that most use cases of prefill no longer require it. Existing models will continue to support prefills, and adding assistant messages elsewhere in the conversation is not affected.</p>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Here are common prefill scenarios and how to migrate away from them:</p>¶
<div data-orientation="vertical"><div data-state="closed" data-orientation="vertical" class="overflow-hidden border border-border-300 rounded-lg my-6"><h3 data-orientation="vertical" data-state="closed" class="flex"><button type="button" aria-controls="radix-_R_4qrilubraivmbrkljb_" aria-expanded="false" data-state="closed" data-orientation="vertical" id="radix-_R_qrilubraivmbrkljb_" class="group w-full flex items-center gap-2 p-4 text-left transparent hover:bg-bg-300 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-accent-secondary-100 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50" data-radix-collection-item=""><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 256 256" class="text-text-500 transition-transform duration-200 flex-shrink-0 group-data-[state=&#x27;open&#x27;]:rotate-90" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M181.66,133.66l-80,80a8,8,0,0,1-11.32-11.32L164.69,128,90.34,53.66a8,8,0,0,1,11.32-11.32l80,80A8,8,0,0,1,181.66,133.66Z"></path></svg><span class="font-semibold text-text-100 flex-1 font-ui">Controlling output formatting</span></button></h3><div data-state="closed" id="radix-_R_4qrilubraivmbrkljb_" hidden="" role="region" aria-labelledby="accordion-controlling-output-formatting" data-orientation="vertical" class="overflow-hidden" style="--radix-accordion-content-height:var(--radix-collapsible-content-height);--radix-accordion-content-width:var(--radix-collapsible-content-width)"></div></div></div>¶
<div data-orientation="vertical"><div data-state="closed" data-orientation="vertical" class="overflow-hidden border border-border-300 rounded-lg my-6"><h3 data-orientation="vertical" data-state="closed" class="flex"><button type="button" aria-controls="radix-_R_4rbilubraivmbrkljb_" aria-expanded="false" data-state="closed" data-orientation="vertical" id="radix-_R_rbilubraivmbrkljb_" class="group w-full flex items-center gap-2 p-4 text-left transparent hover:bg-bg-300 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-accent-secondary-100 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50" data-radix-collection-item=""><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 256 256" class="text-text-500 transition-transform duration-200 flex-shrink-0 group-data-[state=&#x27;open&#x27;]:rotate-90" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M181.66,133.66l-80,80a8,8,0,0,1-11.32-11.32L164.69,128,90.34,53.66a8,8,0,0,1,11.32-11.32l80,80A8,8,0,0,1,181.66,133.66Z"></path></svg><span class="font-semibold text-text-100 flex-1 font-ui">Eliminating preambles</span></button></h3><div data-state="closed" id="radix-_R_4rbilubraivmbrkljb_" hidden="" role="region" aria-labelledby="accordion-eliminating-preambles" data-orientation="vertical" class="overflow-hidden" style="--radix-accordion-content-height:var(--radix-collapsible-content-height);--radix-accordion-content-width:var(--radix-collapsible-content-width)"></div></div></div>¶
<div data-orientation="vertical"><div data-state="closed" data-orientation="vertical" class="overflow-hidden border border-border-300 rounded-lg my-6"><h3 data-orientation="vertical" data-state="closed" class="flex"><button type="button" aria-controls="radix-_R_4rrilubraivmbrkljb_" aria-expanded="false" data-state="closed" data-orientation="vertical" id="radix-_R_rrilubraivmbrkljb_" class="group w-full flex items-center gap-2 p-4 text-left transparent hover:bg-bg-300 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-accent-secondary-100 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50" data-radix-collection-item=""><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 256 256" class="text-text-500 transition-transform duration-200 flex-shrink-0 group-data-[state=&#x27;open&#x27;]:rotate-90" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M181.66,133.66l-80,80a8,8,0,0,1-11.32-11.32L164.69,128,90.34,53.66a8,8,0,0,1,11.32-11.32l80,80A8,8,0,0,1,181.66,133.66Z"></path></svg><span class="font-semibold text-text-100 flex-1 font-ui">Avoiding bad refusals</span></button></h3><div data-state="closed" id="radix-_R_4rrilubraivmbrkljb_" hidden="" role="region" aria-labelledby="accordion-avoiding-bad-refusals" data-orientation="vertical" class="overflow-hidden" style="--radix-accordion-content-height:var(--radix-collapsible-content-height);--radix-accordion-content-width:var(--radix-collapsible-content-width)"></div></div></div>¶
<div data-orientation="vertical"><div data-state="closed" data-orientation="vertical" class="overflow-hidden border border-border-300 rounded-lg my-6"><h3 data-orientation="vertical" data-state="closed" class="flex"><button type="button" aria-controls="radix-_R_4sbilubraivmbrkljb_" aria-expanded="false" data-state="closed" data-orientation="vertical" id="radix-_R_sbilubraivmbrkljb_" class="group w-full flex items-center gap-2 p-4 text-left transparent hover:bg-bg-300 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-accent-secondary-100 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50" data-radix-collection-item=""><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 256 256" class="text-text-500 transition-transform duration-200 flex-shrink-0 group-data-[state=&#x27;open&#x27;]:rotate-90" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M181.66,133.66l-80,80a8,8,0,0,1-11.32-11.32L164.69,128,90.34,53.66a8,8,0,0,1,11.32-11.32l80,80A8,8,0,0,1,181.66,133.66Z"></path></svg><span class="font-semibold text-text-100 flex-1 font-ui">Continuations</span></button></h3><div data-state="closed" id="radix-_R_4sbilubraivmbrkljb_" hidden="" role="region" aria-labelledby="accordion-continuations" data-orientation="vertical" class="overflow-hidden" style="--radix-accordion-content-height:var(--radix-collapsible-content-height);--radix-accordion-content-width:var(--radix-collapsible-content-width)"></div></div></div>¶
<div data-orientation="vertical"><div data-state="closed" data-orientation="vertical" class="overflow-hidden border border-border-300 rounded-lg my-6"><h3 data-orientation="vertical" data-state="closed" class="flex"><button type="button" aria-controls="radix-_R_4srilubraivmbrkljb_" aria-expanded="false" data-state="closed" data-orientation="vertical" id="radix-_R_srilubraivmbrkljb_" class="group w-full flex items-center gap-2 p-4 text-left transparent hover:bg-bg-300 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-accent-secondary-100 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50" data-radix-collection-item=""><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 256 256" class="text-text-500 transition-transform duration-200 flex-shrink-0 group-data-[state=&#x27;open&#x27;]:rotate-90" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M181.66,133.66l-80,80a8,8,0,0,1-11.32-11.32L164.69,128,90.34,53.66a8,8,0,0,1,11.32-11.32l80,80A8,8,0,0,1,181.66,133.66Z"></path></svg><span class="font-semibold text-text-100 flex-1 font-ui">Context hydration and role consistency</span></button></h3><div data-state="closed" id="radix-_R_4srilubraivmbrkljb_" hidden="" role="region" aria-labelledby="accordion-context-hydration-and-role-consistency" data-orientation="vertical" class="overflow-hidden" style="--radix-accordion-content-height:var(--radix-collapsible-content-height);--radix-accordion-content-width:var(--radix-collapsible-content-width)"></div></div></div>¶

<h3 class="text-xl font-medium leading-[1.25] text-text-100"><div class="group relative pt-6 pb-2" id="tool-usage"><div class="absolute hidden lg:flex lg:items-center lg:-ml-8 top-[calc(1.5rem+0.08em)]"><button class="inline-flex¶

ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>Tool usage</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h3>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Claude&#x27;s latest models are trained for precise instruction following and benefit from explicit direction to use specific tools. If you say &quot;can you suggest some changes,&quot; Claude will sometimes provide suggestions rather than implementing themeven if making changes might be what you intended.</p>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">For Claude to take action, be more explicit:</p>¶
<div data-orientation="vertical"><div data-state="closed" data-orientation="vertical" class="overflow-hidden border border-border-300 rounded-lg my-6"><h3 data-orientation="vertical" data-state="closed" class="flex"><button type="button" aria-controls="radix-_R_4vbilubraivmbrkljb_" aria-expanded="false" data-state="closed" data-orientation="vertical" id="radix-_R_vbilubraivmbrkljb_" class="group w-full flex items-center gap-2 p-4 text-left transparent hover:bg-bg-300 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-accent-secondary-100 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50" data-radix-collection-item=""><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 256 256" class="text-text-500 transition-transform duration-200 flex-shrink-0 group-data-[state=&#x27;open&#x27;]:rotate-90" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M181.66,133.66l-80,80a8,8,0,0,1-11.32-11.32L164.69,128,90.34,53.66a8,8,0,0,1,11.32-11.32l80,80A8,8,0,0,1,181.66,133.66Z"></path></svg><span class="font-semibold text-text-100 flex-1 font-ui">Example: Explicit instructions</span></button></h3><div data-state="closed" id="radix-_R_4vbilubraivmbrkljb_" hidden="" role="region" aria-labelledby="accordion-example:-explicit-instructions" data-orientation="vertical" class="overflow-hidden" style="--radix-accordion-content-height:var(--radix-collapsible-content-height);--radix-accordion-content-width:var(--radix-collapsible-content-width)"></div></div></div>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">To make Claude more proactive about taking action by default, you can add this to your system prompt:</p>¶
<div class="group relative my-6 rounded-lg bg-bg-000 overflow-hidden border-0.5 border-border-300"><div class="group flex items-center justify-between border-b-0.5 border-border-300 px-4 py-1.5 bg-bg-200"><div class="flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-text-500">Sample prompt for proactive action</div><div class="flex items-center gap-1"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-8 w-8 rounded-md active:scale-95 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy code"><div class="relative flex items-center justify-center"><div class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M12.5 3C13.3284 3 14 3.67157 14 4.5V6H15.5C16.3284 6 17 6.67157 17 7.5V15.5C17 16.3284 16.3284 17 15.5 17H7.5C6.67157 17 6 16.3284 6 15.5V14H4.5C3.67157 14 3 13.3284 3 12.5V4.5C3 3.67157 3.67157 3 4.5 3H12.5ZM14 12.5C14 13.3284 13.3284 14 12.5 14H7V15.5C7 15.7761 7.22386 16 7.5 16H15.5C15.7761 16 16 15.7761 16 15.5V7.5C16 7.22386 15.7761 7 15.5 7H14V12.5ZM4.5 4C4.22386 4 4 4.22386 4 4.5V12.5C4 12.7761 4.22386 13 4.5 13H12.5C12.7761 13 13 12.7761 13 12.5V4.5C13 4.22386 12.7761 4 12.5 4H4.5Z"></path></svg></div><div class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M15.1883 5.10908C15.3699 4.96398 15.6346 4.96153 15.8202 5.11592C16.0056 5.27067 16.0504 5.53125 15.9403 5.73605L15.8836 5.82003L8.38354 14.8202C8.29361 14.9279 8.16242 14.9925 8.02221 14.9989C7.88203 15.0051 7.74545 14.9526 7.64622 14.8534L4.14617 11.3533L4.08172 11.2752C3.95384 11.0811 3.97542 10.817 4.14617 10.6463C4.31693 10.4755 4.58105 10.4539 4.77509 10.5818L4.85321 10.6463L7.96556 13.7586L15.1161 5.1794L15.1883 5.10908Z"></path></svg></div></div></button></div></div><div class="relative py-4 pl-4 font-mono text-sm md:text-sm overflow-x-auto code-block-scroll" tabindex="0"><pre class="inline-block min-w-full pr-4"><code>&lt;default_to_action&gt;¶
By default, implement changes rather than only suggesting them. If the user&#x27;s intent is unclear, infer the most useful likely action and proceed, using tools to discover any missing details instead of guessing. Try to infer the user&#x27;s intent about whether a tool call (e.g., file edit or read) is intended or not, and act accordingly.¶
&lt;/default_to_action&gt;</code></pre></div></div>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">On the other hand, if you want the model to be more hesitant by default, less prone to jumping straight into implementations, and only take action if requested, you can steer this behavior with a prompt like the below:</p>¶
<div class="group relative my-6 rounded-lg bg-bg-000 overflow-hidden border-0.5 border-border-300"><div class="group flex items-center justify-between border-b-0.5 border-border-300 px-4 py-1.5 bg-bg-200"><div class="flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-text-500">Sample prompt for conservative action</div><div class="flex items-center gap-1"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-8 w-8 rounded-md active:scale-95 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy code"><div class="relative flex items-center justify-center"><div class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M12.5 3C13.3284 3 14 3.67157 14 4.5V6H15.5C16.3284 6 17 6.67157 17 7.5V15.5C17 16.3284 16.3284 17 15.5 17H7.5C6.67157 17 6 16.3284 6 15.5V14H4.5C3.67157 14 3 13.3284 3 12.5V4.5C3 3.67157 3.67157 3 4.5 3H12.5ZM14 12.5C14 13.3284 13.3284 14 12.5 14H7V15.5C7 15.7761 7.22386 16 7.5 16H15.5C15.7761 16 16 15.7761 16 15.5V7.5C16 7.22386 15.7761 7 15.5 7H14V12.5ZM4.5 4C4.22386 4 4 4.22386 4 4.5V12.5C4 12.7761 4.22386 13 4.5 13H12.5C12.7761 13 13 12.7761 13 12.5V4.5C13 4.22386 12.7761 4 12.5 4H4.5Z"></path></svg></div><div class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M15.1883 5.10908C15.3699 4.96398 15.6346 4.96153 15.8202 5.11592C16.0056 5.27067 16.0504 5.53125 15.9403 5.73605L15.8836 5.82003L8.38354 14.8202C8.29361 14.9279 8.16242 14.9925 8.02221 14.9989C7.88203 15.0051 7.74545 14.9526 7.64622 14.8534L4.14617 11.3533L4.08172 11.2752C3.95384 11.0811 3.97542 10.817 4.14617 10.6463C4.31693 10.4755 4.58105 10.4539 4.77509 10.5818L4.85321 10.6463L7.96556 13.7586L15.1161 5.1794L15.1883 5.10908Z"></path></svg></div></div></button></div></div><div class="relative py-4 pl-4 font-mono text-sm md:text-sm overflow-x-auto code-block-scroll" tabindex="0"><pre class="inline-block min-w-full pr-4"><code>&lt;do_not_act_before_instructions&gt;¶
Do not jump into implementatation or changes files unless clearly instructed to make changes. When the user&#x27;s intent is ambiguous, default to providing information, doing research, and providing recommendations rather than taking action. Only proceed with edits, modifications, or implementations when the user explicitly requests them.¶
&lt;/do_not_act_before_instructions&gt;</code></pre></div></div>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Claude Opus 4.5 and Claude Opus 4.6 are also more responsive to the system prompt than previous models. If your prompts were designed to reduce undertriggering on tools or skills, these models may now overtrigger. The fix is to dial back any aggressive language. Where you might have said &quot;CRITICAL: You MUST use this tool when...&quot;, you can use more normal prompting like &quot;Use this tool when...&quot;.</p>¶
<h3 class="text-xl font-medium leading-[1.25] text-text-100"><div class="group relative pt-6 pb-2" id="optimize-parallel-tool-calling"><div class="absolute hidden lg:flex lg:items-center lg:-ml-8 top-[calc(1.5rem+0.08em)]"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>Optimize parallel tool calling</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h3>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Claude&#x27;s latest models excel at parallel tool execution. These models will:</p>¶
<ul class="list-none pl-8 [&amp;_ul]:pl-8 [&amp;_ol]:pl-8 mb-4">¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]">Run multiple speculative searches during research</li>¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]">Read several files at once to build context faster</li>¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]">Execute bash commands in parallel (which can even bottleneck system performance)</li>¶
</ul>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">This behavior is easily steerable. While the model has a high success rate in parallel tool calling without prompting, you can boost this to ~100% or adjust the aggression level:</p>¶
<div class="group relative my-6 rounded-lg bg-bg-000 overflow-hidden border-0.5 border-border-300"><div class="group flex items-center justify-between border-b-0.5 border-border-300 px-4 py-1.5 bg-bg-200"><div class="flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-text-500">Sample prompt for maximum parallel efficiency</div><div class="flex items-center gap-1"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-8 w-8 rounded-md active:scale-95 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy code"><div class="relative flex items-center justify-center"><div class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M12.5 3C13.3284 3 14 3.67157 14 4.5V6H15.5C16.3284 6 17 6.67157 17 7.5V15.5C17 16.3284 16.3284 17 15.5 17H7.5C6.67157 17 6 16.3284 6 15.5V14H4.5C3.67157 14 3 13.3284 3 12.5V4.5C3 3.67157 3.67157 3 4.5 3H12.5ZM14 12.5C14 13.3284 13.3284 14 12.5 14H7V15.5C7 15.7761 7.22386 16 7.5 16H15.5C15.7761 16 16 15.7761 16 15.5V7.5C16 7.22386 15.7761 7 15.5 7H14V12.5ZM4.5 4C4.22386 4 4 4.22386 4 4.5V12.5C4 12.7761 4.22386 13 4.5 13H12.5C12.7761 13 13 12.7761 13 12.5V4.5C13 4.22386 12.7761 4 12.5 4H4.5Z"></path></svg></div><div class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M15.1883 5.10908C15.3699 4.96398 15.6346 4.96153 15.8202 5.11592C16.0056 5.27067 16.0504 5.53125 15.9403 5.73605L15.8836 5.82003L8.38354 14.8202C8.29361 14.9279 8.16242 14.9925 8.02221 14.9989C7.88203 15.0051 7.74545 14.9526 7.64622 14.8534L4.14617 11.3533L4.08172 11.2752C3.95384 11.0811 3.97542 10.817 4.14617 10.6463C4.31693 10.4755 4.58105 10.4539 4.77509 10.5818L4.85321 10.6463L7.96556 13.7586L15.1161 5.1794L15.1883 5.10908Z"></path></svg></div></div></button></div></div><div class="relative py-4 pl-4 font-mono text-sm md:text-sm overflow-x-auto code-block-scroll" tabindex="0"><pre class="inline-block min-w-full pr-4"><code>&lt;use_parallel_tool_calls&gt;¶
If you intend to call multiple tools and there are no dependencies between the tool calls, make all of the independent tool calls in parallel. Prioritize calling tools simultaneously whenever the actions can be done in parallel rather than sequentially. For example, when reading 3 files, run 3 tool calls in parallel to read all 3 files into context at the same time. Maximize use of parallel tool calls where possible to increase speed and efficiency. However, if some tool calls depend on previous calls to inform dependent values like the parameters, do NOT call these tools in parallel and instead call them sequentially. Never use placeholders or guess missing parameters in tool calls.¶
&lt;/use_parallel_tool_calls&gt;</code></pre></div></div>¶
<div class="group relative my-6 rounded-lg bg-bg-000 overflow-hidden border-0.5 border-border-300"><div class="group flex items-center justify-between border-b-0.5 border-border-300 px-4 py-1.5 bg-bg-200"><div class="flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-text-500">Sample prompt to reduce parallel execution</div><div class="flex items-center gap-1"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-8 w-8 rounded-md active:scale-95 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy code"><div class="relative flex items-center justify-center"><div class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M12.5 3C13.3284 3 14 3.67157 14 4.5V6H15.5C16.3284 6 17 6.67157 17 7.5V15.5C17 16.3284 16.3284 17 15.5 17H7.5C6.67157 17 6 16.3284 6 15.5V14H4.5C3.67157 14 3 13.3284 3 12.5V4.5C3 3.67157 3.67157 3 4.5 3H12.5ZM14 12.5C14 13.3284 13.3284 14 12.5 14H7V15.5C7 15.7761 7.22386 16 7.5 16H15.5C15.7761 16 16 15.7761 16 15.5V7.5C16 7.22386 15.7761 7 15.5 7H14V12.5ZM4.5 4C4.22386 4 4 4.22386 4 4.5V12.5C4 12.7761 4.22386 13 4.5 13H12.5C12.7761 13 13 12.7761 13 12.5V4.5C13 4.22386 12.7761 4 12.5 4H4.5Z"></path></svg></div><div class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M15.1883 5.10908C15.3699 4.96398 15.6346 4.96153 15.8202 5.11592C16.0056 5.27067 16.0504 5.53125 15.9403 5.73605L15.8836 5.82003L8.38354 14.8202C8.29361 14.9279 8.16242 14.9925 8.02221 14.9989C7.88203 15.0051 7.74545 14.9526 7.64622 14.8534L4.14617 11.3533L4.08172 11.2752C3.95384 11.0811 3.97542 10.817 4.14617 10.6463C4.31693 10.4755 4.58105 10.4539 4.77509 10.5818L4.85321 10.6463L7.96556 13.7586L15.1161 5.1794L15.1883 5.10908Z"></path></svg></div></div></button></div></div><div class="relative py-4 pl-4 font-mono text-sm md:text-sm overflow-x-auto code-block-scroll" tabindex="0"><pre class="inline-block min-w-full pr-4"><code>Execute operations sequentially with brief pauses between each step to ensure stability.</code></pre></div></div>¶
<h2 class="font-heading leading-[1.25] text-text-100"><div class="group relative pt-6 pb-2" id="thinking-and-reasoning"><div class="absolute hidden lg:flex lg:items-center lg:-ml-8 top-[calc(1.5rem+0.175em)]"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>Thinking and reasoning</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h2>¶
<h3 class="text-xl font-medium leading-[1.25] text-text-100"><div class="group relative pt-6 pb-2" id="overthinking-and-excessive-thoroughness"><div class="absolute hidden lg:flex lg:items-center lg:-ml-8 top-[calc(1.5rem+0.08em)]"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>Overthinking and excessive thoroughness</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h3>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Claude Opus 4.6 does significantly more upfront exploration than previous models, especially at higher <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">effort</code> settings. This initial work often helps to optimize the final results, but the model may gather extensive context or pursue multiple threads of research without being prompted. If your prompts previously encouraged the model to be more thorough, you should tune that guidance for Claude Opus 4.6:</p>¶
<ul class="list-none pl-8 [&amp;_ul]:pl-8 [&amp;_ol]:pl-8 mb-4">¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]"><strong class="font-semibold">Replace blanket defaults with more targeted instructions.</strong> Instead of &quot;Default to using [tool],&quot; add guidance like &quot;Use [tool] when it would enhance your understanding of the problem.&quot;</li>¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]"><strong class="font-semibold">Remove over-prompting.</strong> Tools that undertriggered in previous models are likely to trigger appropriately now. Instructions like &quot;If in doubt, use [tool]&quot; will cause overtriggering.</li>¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]"><strong class="font-semibold">Use effort as a fallback.</strong> If Claude continues to be overly aggressive, use a lower setting for <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">effort</code>.</li>¶
</ul>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">In some cases, Claude Opus 4.6 may think extensively, which can inflate thinking tokens and slow down responses. If this behavior is undesirable, you can add explicit instructions to constrain its reasoning, or you can lower the <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">effort</code> setting to reduce overall thinking and token usage.</p>¶
<div class="group relative my-6 rounded-lg bg-bg-000 overflow-hidden border-0.5 border-border-300"><div class="group flex items-center justify-between border-b-0.5 border-border-300 px-4 py-1.5 bg-bg-200"><div class="flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-text-500">Sample prompt</div><div class="flex items-center gap-1"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-8 w-8 rounded-md active:scale-95 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy code"><div class="relative flex items-center justify-center"><div class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M12.5 3C13.3284 3 14 3.67157 14 4.5V6H15.5C16.3284 6 17 6.67157 17 7.5V15.5C17 16.3284 16.3284 17 15.5 17H7.5C6.67157 17 6 16.3284 6 15.5V14H4.5C3.67157 14 3 13.3284 3 12.5V4.5C3 3.67157 3.67157 3 4.5 3H12.5ZM14 12.5C14 13.3284 13.3284 14 12.5 14H7V15.5C7 15.7761 7.22386 16 7.5 16H15.5C15.7761 16 16 15.7761 16 15.5V7.5C16 7.22386 15.7761 7 15.5 7H14V12.5ZM4.5 4C4.22386 4 4 4.22386 4 4.5V12.5C4 12.7761 4.22386 13 4.5 13H12.5C12.7761 13 13 12.7761 13 12.5V4.5C13 4.22386 12.7761 4 12.5 4H4.5Z"></path></svg></div><div class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M15.1883 5.10908C15.3699 4.96398 15.6346 4.96153 15.8202 5.11592C16.0056 5.27067 16.0504 5.53125 15.9403 5.73605L15.8836 5.82003L8.38354 14.8202C8.29361 14.9279 8.16242 14.9925 8.02221 14.9989C7.88203 15.0051 7.74545 14.9526 7.64622 14.8534L4.14617 11.3533L4.08172 11.2752C3.95384 11.0811 3.97542 10.817 4.14617 10.6463C4.31693 10.4755 4.58105 10.4539 4.77509 10.5818L4.85321 10.6463L7.96556 13.7586L15.1161 5.1794L15.1883 5.10908Z"></path></svg></div></div></button></div></div><div class="relative py-4 pl-4 font-mono text-sm md:text-sm overflow-x-auto code-block-scroll" tabindex="0"><pre class="inline-block min-w-full pr-4"><code>When you&#x27;re deciding how to approach a problem, choose an approach and commit to it. Avoid revisiting decisions unless you encounter new information that directly contradicts your reasoning. If you&#x27;re weighing two approaches, pick one and see it through. You can always course-correct later if the chosen approach fails.</code></pre></div></div>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">For Claude Sonnet 4.6 specifically, switching from adaptive to extended thinking with a <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">budget_tokens</code> cap provides a hard ceiling on thinking costs while preserving quality.</p>¶
<h3 class="text-xl font-medium leading-[1.25] text-text-100"><div class="group relative pt-6 pb-2" id="leverage-thinking-and-interleaved-thinking-capabilities"><div class="absolute hidden lg:flex lg:items-center lg:-ml-8 top-[calc(1.5rem+0.08em)]"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>Leverage thinking &amp; interleaved thinking capabilities</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h3>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Claude&#x27;s latest models offer thinking capabilities that can be especially helpful for tasks involving reflection after tool use or complex multi-step reasoning. You can guide its initial or interleaved thinking for better results.</p>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Claude Opus 4.6 uses <a class="inline-link" href="/docs/en/build-with-claude/adaptive-thinking">adaptive thinking</a> (<code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">thinking: {type: &quot;adaptive&quot;}</code>), where Claude dynamically decides when and how much to think. Claude Sonnet 4.6 supports both adaptive thinking and manual extended thinking with <a class="inline-link" href="/docs/en/build-with-claude/extended-thinking#interleaved-thinking">interleaved mode</a>. Claude calibrates its thinking based on two factors: the <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">effort</code> parameter and query complexity. Higher effort elicits more thinking, and more complex queries do the same. On easier queries that don&#x27;t require thinking, the model responds directly. In internal evaluations, adaptive thinking reliably drives better performance than extended thinking, and we recommend moving to adaptive thinking to get the most intelligent responses.</p>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">For Sonnet 4.6, consider trying adaptive thinking for workloads that require agentic behavior such as multi-step tool use, complex coding tasks, and long-horizon agent loops. If adaptive thinking doesn&#x27;t fit your use case, manual extended thinking with interleaved mode remains supported. Older models use manual thinking mode with <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">budget_tokens</code>.</p>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">You can guide Claude&#x27;s thinking behavior:</p>¶
<div class="group relative my-6 rounded-lg bg-bg-000 overflow-hidden border-0.5 border-border-300"><div class="group flex items-center justify-between border-b-0.5 border-border-300 px-4 py-1.5 bg-bg-200"><div class="flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-text-500">Example prompt</div><div class="flex items-center gap-1"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-8 w-8 rounded-md active:scale-95 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy code"><div class="relative flex items-center justify-center"><div class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M12.5 3C13.3284 3 14 3.67157 14 4.5V6H15.5C16.3284 6 17 6.67157 17 7.5V15.5C17 16.3284 16.3284 17 15.5 17H7.5C6.67157 17 6 16.3284 6 15.5V14H4.5C3.67157 14 3 13.3284 3 12.5V4.5C3 3.67157 3.67157 3 4.5 3H12.5ZM14 12.5C14 13.3284 13.3284 14 12.5 14H7V15.5C7 15.7761 7.22386 16 7.5 16H15.5C15.7761 16 16 15.7761 16 15.5V7.5C16 7.22386 15.7761 7 15.5 7H14V12.5ZM4.5 4C4.22386 4 4 4.22386 4 4.5V12.5C4 12.7761 4.22386 13 4.5 13H12.5C12.7761 13 13 12.7761 13 12.5V4.5C13 4.22386 12.7761 4 12.5 4H4.5Z"></path></svg></div><div class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M15.1883 5.10908C15.3699 4.96398 15.6346 4.96153 15.8202 5.11592C16.0056 5.27067 16.0504 5.53125 15.9403 5.73605L15.8836 5.82003L8.38354 14.8202C8.29361 14.9279 8.16242 14.9925 8.02221 14.9989C7.88203 15.0051 7.74545 14.9526 7.64622 14.8534L4.14617 11.3533L4.08172 11.2752C3.95384 11.0811 3.97542 10.817 4.14617 10.6463C4.31693 10.4755 4.58105 10.4539 4.77509 10.5818L4.85321 10.6463L7.96556 13.7586L15.1161 5.1794L15.1883 5.10908Z"></path></svg></div></div></button></div></div><div class="relative py-4 pl-4 font-mono text-sm md:text-sm overflow-x-auto code-block-scroll" tabindex="0"><pre class="inline-block min-w-full pr-4"><code>After receiving tool results, carefully reflect on their quality and determine optimal next steps before proceeding. Use your thinking to plan and iterate based on this new information, and then take the best next action.</code></pre></div></div>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">The triggering behavior for adaptive thinking is promptable. If you find the model thinking more often than you&#x27;d like, which can happen with large or complex system prompts, add guidance to steer it:</p>¶
<div class="group relative my-6 rounded-lg bg-bg-000 overflow-hidden border-0.5 border-border-300"><div class="group flex items-center justify-between border-b-0.5 border-border-300 px-4 py-1.5 bg-bg-200"><div class="flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-text-500">Sample prompt</div><div class="flex items-center gap-1"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-8 w-8 rounded-md active:scale-95 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy code"><div class="relative flex items-center justify-center"><div class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M12.5 3C13.3284 3 14 3.67157 14 4.5V6H15.5C16.3284 6 17 6.67157 17 7.5V15.5C17 16.3284 16.3284 17 15.5 17H7.5C6.67157 17 6 16.3284 6 15.5V14H4.5C3.67157 14 3 13.3284 3 12.5V4.5C3 3.67157 3.67157 3 4.5 3H12.5ZM14 12.5C14 13.3284 13.3284 14 12.5 14H7V15.5C7 15.7761 7.22386 16 7.5 16H15.5C15.7761 16 16 15.7761 16 15.5V7.5C16 7.22386 15.7761 7 15.5 7H14V12.5ZM4.5 4C4.22386 4 4 4.22386 4 4.5V12.5C4 12.7761 4.22386 13 4.5 13H12.5C12.7761 13 13 12.7761 13 12.5V4.5C13 4.22386 12.7761 4 12.5 4H4.5Z"></path></svg></div><div class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M15.1883 5.10908C15.3699 4.96398 15.6346 4.96153 15.8202 5.11592C16.0056 5.27067 16.0504 5.53125 15.9403 5.73605L15.8836 5.82003L8.38354 14.8202C8.29361 14.9279 8.16242 14.9925 8.02221 14.9989C7.88203 15.0051 7.74545 14.9526 7.64622 14.8534L4.14617 11.3533L4.08172 11.2752C3.95384 11.0811 3.97542 10.817 4.14617 10.6463C4.31693 10.4755 4.58105 10.4539 4.77509 10.5818L4.85321 10.6463L7.96556 13.7586L15.1161 5.1794L15.1883 5.10908Z"></path></svg></div></div></button></div></div><div class="relative py-4 pl-4 font-mono text-sm md:text-sm overflow-x-auto code-block-scroll" tabindex="0"><pre class="inline-block min-w-full pr-4"><code>Extended thinking adds latency and should only be used when it will meaningfully improve answer quality - typically for problems that require multi-step reasoning. When in doubt, respond directly.</code></pre></div></div>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">If you are migrating from <a class="inline-link" href="/docs/en/build-with-claude/extended-thinking">extended thinking</a> with <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">budget_tokens</code>, replace your thinking configuration and move budget control to <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">effort</code>:</p>¶
<div class="group relative my-6 rounded-lg bg-bg-000 overflow-hidden border-0.5 border-border-300"><div class="group flex items-center justify-between border-b-0.5 border-border-300 px-4 py-1.5 bg-bg-200"><div class="flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-text-500">Before (extended thinking, older models)</div><div class="flex items-center gap-1"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶

tabindex="0"><code><span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">client.messages.create(</span></span>¶

<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> max_tokens</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#B5CEA8">64000</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">,</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> thinking</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">{</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"type"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"enabled"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">, </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"budget_tokens"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#B5CEA8">32000</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">},</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> messages</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">[{</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"role"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"user"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">, </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"content"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"..."</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">}],</span></span>¶
