disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>Minimizing hallucinations in agentic coding</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h3>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Claude&#x27;s latest models are less prone to hallucinations and give more accurate, grounded, intelligent answers based on the code. To encourage this behavior even more and minimize hallucinations:</p>¶
<div class="group relative my-6 rounded-lg bg-bg-000 overflow-hidden border-0.5 border-border-300"><div class="group flex items-center justify-between border-b-0.5 border-border-300 px-4 py-1.5 bg-bg-200"><div class="flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-text-500">Sample prompt</div><div class="flex items-center gap-1"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-8 w-8 rounded-md active:scale-95 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy code"><div class="relative flex items-center justify-center"><div class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M12.5 3C13.3284 3 14 3.67157 14 4.5V6H15.5C16.3284 6 17 6.67157 17 7.5V15.5C17 16.3284 16.3284 17 15.5 17H7.5C6.67157 17 6 16.3284 6 15.5V14H4.5C3.67157 14 3 13.3284 3 12.5V4.5C3 3.67157 3.67157 3 4.5 3H12.5ZM14 12.5C14 13.3284 13.3284 14 12.5 14H7V15.5C7 15.7761 7.22386 16 7.5 16H15.5C15.7761 16 16 15.7761 16 15.5V7.5C16 7.22386 15.7761 7 15.5 7H14V12.5ZM4.5 4C4.22386 4 4 4.22386 4 4.5V12.5C4 12.7761 4.22386 13 4.5 13H12.5C12.7761 13 13 12.7761 13 12.5V4.5C13 4.22386 12.7761 4 12.5 4H4.5Z"></path></svg></div><div class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M15.1883 5.10908C15.3699 4.96398 15.6346 4.96153 15.8202 5.11592C16.0056 5.27067 16.0504 5.53125 15.9403 5.73605L15.8836 5.82003L8.38354 14.8202C8.29361 14.9279 8.16242 14.9925 8.02221 14.9989C7.88203 15.0051 7.74545 14.9526 7.64622 14.8534L4.14617 11.3533L4.08172 11.2752C3.95384 11.0811 3.97542 10.817 4.14617 10.6463C4.31693 10.4755 4.58105 10.4539 4.77509 10.5818L4.85321 10.6463L7.96556 13.7586L15.1161 5.1794L15.1883 5.10908Z"></path></svg></div></div></button></div></div><div class="relative py-4 pl-4 font-mono text-sm md:text-sm overflow-x-auto code-block-scroll" tabindex="0"><pre class="inline-block min-w-full pr-4"><code>&lt;investigate_before_answering&gt;¶
Never speculate about code you have not opened. If the user references a specific file, you MUST read the file before answering. Make sure to investigate and read relevant files BEFORE answering questions about the codebase. Never make any claims about code before investigating unless you are certain of the correct answer - give grounded and hallucination-free answers.¶
&lt;/investigate_before_answering&gt;</code></pre></div></div>¶
<h2 class="font-heading leading-[1.25] text-text-100"><div class="group relative pt-6 pb-2" id="capability-specific-tips"><div class="absolute hidden lg:flex lg:items-center lg:-ml-8 top-[calc(1.5rem+0.175em)]"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>Capability-specific tips</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h2>¶
<h3 class="text-xl font-medium leading-[1.25] text-text-100"><div class="group relative pt-6 pb-2" id="improved-vision-capabilities"><div class="absolute hidden lg:flex lg:items-center lg:-ml-8 top-[calc(1.5rem+0.08em)]"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>Improved vision capabilities</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h3>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Claude Opus 4.5 and Claude Opus 4.6 have improved vision capabilities compared to previous Claude models. They perform better on image processing and data extraction tasks, particularly when there are multiple images present in context. These improvements carry over to computer use, where the models can more reliably interpret screenshots and UI elements. You can also use these models to analyze videos by breaking them up into frames.</p>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">One technique we&#x27;ve found effective to further boost performance is to give Claude a crop tool or <a class="inline-link" href="/docs/en/agents-and-tools/agent-skills/overview">skill</a>. We&#x27;ve seen consistent uplift on image evaluations when Claude is able to &quot;zoom&quot; in on relevant regions of an image. We&#x27;ve put together a <a class="inline-link" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://platform.claude.com/cookbook/multimodal-crop-tool">cookbook for the crop tool</a>.</p>¶
<h3 class="text-xl font-medium leading-[1.25] text-text-100"><div class="group relative pt-6 pb-2" id="frontend-design"><div class="absolute hidden lg:flex lg:items-center lg:-ml-8 top-[calc(1.5rem+0.08em)]"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>Frontend design</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h3>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Claude Opus 4.5 and Claude Opus 4.6 excel at building complex, real-world web applications with strong frontend design. However, without guidance, models can default to generic patterns that create what users call the &quot;AI slop&quot; aesthetic. To create distinctive, creative frontends that surprise and delight:</p>¶
<div class="flex w-full rounded-lg px-4 py-3 gap-1 items-start text-sm border-0.5 my-6 border-border-200 bg-bg-200 callout"><div class="flex mr-2 shrink-0 pt-[1.375px] text-text-000"><div style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M12.5 17C12.7761 17 13 17.2239 13 17.5C13 17.7761 12.7761 18 12.5 18H7.5C7.22386 18 7 17.7761 7 17.5C7 17.2239 7.22386 17 7.5 17H12.5ZM10 2C13.3137 2 16 4.68629 16 8C16 9.73776 15.2608 11.3033 14.0811 12.3984L13.8389 12.6113C13.3268 13.0382 13 13.5753 13 14.124V15.5C13 15.7761 12.7761 16 12.5 16H7.5C7.22386 16 7 15.7761 7 15.5V14.124C6.99998 13.6438 6.7495 13.1727 6.34375 12.7764L6.16113 12.6113C4.84147 11.5115 4 9.85368 4 8C4 4.68629 6.68629 2 10 2ZM10 3C7.23858 3 5 5.23858 5 8C5 9.5443 5.69948 10.9248 6.80078 11.8428L7.03711 12.0557C7.57356 12.5787 7.99998 13.2899 8 14.124V15H9.5V11.207L7.14648 8.85352L7.08203 8.77539C6.95387 8.58131 6.97562 8.31735 7.14648 8.14648C7.31735 7.97562 7.58131 7.95387 7.77539 8.08203L7.85352 8.14648L10 10.293L12.1465 8.14648L12.2246 8.08203C12.4187 7.95387 12.6827 7.97562 12.8535 8.14648C13.0244 8.31735 13.0461 8.58131 12.918 8.77539L12.8535 8.85352L10.5 11.207V15H12V14.124C12 13.1706 12.5575 12.3776 13.1992 11.8428L13.4004 11.665C14.3848 10.7513 15 9.44786 15 8C15 5.23858 12.7614 3 10 3Z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="grow min-w-0 leading-relaxed [&amp;&gt;*:last-child]:mb-0 text-text-000 [&amp;_li]:before:text-text-000/60 [&amp;_blockquote]:border-l-text-000/60 [&amp;_code]:text-text-000 [&amp;_code]:bg-text-000/10"><p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">For a detailed guide on improving frontend design, see the blog post on <a class="inline-link" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://www.claude.com/blog/improving-frontend-design-through-skills">improving frontend design through skills</a>.</p></div></div>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Here&#x27;s a system prompt snippet you can use to encourage better frontend design:</p>¶
<div class="group relative my-6 rounded-lg bg-bg-000 overflow-hidden border-0.5 border-border-300"><div class="group flex items-center justify-between border-b-0.5 border-border-300 px-4 py-1.5 bg-bg-200"><div class="flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-text-500">Sample prompt for frontend aesthetics</div><div class="flex items-center gap-1"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-8 w-8 rounded-md active:scale-95 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy code"><div class="relative flex items-center justify-center"><div class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M12.5 3C13.3284 3 14 3.67157 14 4.5V6H15.5C16.3284 6 17 6.67157 17 7.5V15.5C17 16.3284 16.3284 17 15.5 17H7.5C6.67157 17 6 16.3284 6 15.5V14H4.5C3.67157 14 3 13.3284 3 12.5V4.5C3 3.67157 3.67157 3 4.5 3H12.5ZM14 12.5C14 13.3284 13.3284 14 12.5 14H7V15.5C7 15.7761 7.22386 16 7.5 16H15.5C15.7761 16 16 15.7761 16 15.5V7.5C16 7.22386 15.7761 7 15.5 7H14V12.5ZM4.5 4C4.22386 4 4 4.22386 4 4.5V12.5C4 12.7761 4.22386 13 4.5 13H12.5C12.7761 13 13 12.7761 13 12.5V4.5C13 4.22386 12.7761 4 12.5 4H4.5Z"></path></svg></div><div class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M15.1883 5.10908C15.3699 4.96398 15.6346 4.96153 15.8202 5.11592C16.0056 5.27067 16.0504 5.53125 15.9403 5.73605L15.8836 5.82003L8.38354 14.8202C8.29361 14.9279 8.16242 14.9925 8.02221 14.9989C7.88203 15.0051 7.74545 14.9526 7.64622 14.8534L4.14617 11.3533L4.08172 11.2752C3.95384 11.0811 3.97542 10.817 4.14617 10.6463C4.31693 10.4755 4.58105 10.4539 4.77509 10.5818L4.85321 10.6463L7.96556 13.7586L15.1161 5.1794L15.1883 5.10908Z"></path></svg></div></div></button></div></div><div class="relative py-4 pl-4 font-mono text-sm md:text-sm overflow-x-auto code-block-scroll" tabindex="0"><pre class="inline-block min-w-full pr-4"><code>&lt;frontend_aesthetics&gt;¶
You tend to converge toward generic, &quot;on distribution&quot; outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the &quot;AI slop&quot; aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.¶
¶
Focus on:¶
- Typography: Choose fonts that are beautiful, unique, and interesting. Avoid generic fonts like Arial and Inter; opt instead for distinctive choices that elevate the frontend&#x27;s aesthetics.¶
- Color &amp; Theme: Commit to a cohesive aesthetic. Use CSS variables for consistency. Dominant colors with sharp accents outperform timid, evenly-distributed palettes. Draw from IDE themes and cultural aesthetics for inspiration.¶
- Motion: Use animations for effects and micro-interactions. Prioritize CSS-only solutions for HTML. Use Motion library for React when available. Focus on high-impact moments: one well-orchestrated page load with staggered reveals (animation-delay) creates more delight than scattered micro-interactions.¶
- Backgrounds: Create atmosphere and depth rather than defaulting to solid colors. Layer CSS gradients, use geometric patterns, or add contextual effects that match the overall aesthetic.¶
¶
Avoid generic AI-generated aesthetics:¶
- Overused font families (Inter, Roboto, Arial, system fonts)¶
- Clichd color schemes (particularly purple gradients on white backgrounds)¶
- Predictable layouts and component patterns¶
- Cookie-cutter design that lacks context-specific character¶
¶
Interpret creatively and make unexpected choices that feel genuinely designed for the context. Vary between light and dark themes, different fonts, different aesthetics. You still tend to converge on common choices (Space Grotesk, for example) across generations. Avoid this: it is critical that you think outside the box!¶
&lt;/frontend_aesthetics&gt;</code></pre></div></div>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">You can also refer to the <a class="inline-link" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code/blob/main/plugins/frontend-design/skills/frontend-design/SKILL.md">full skill definition</a>.</p>¶
<h2 class="font-heading leading-[1.25] text-text-100"><div class="group relative pt-6 pb-2" id="migration-considerations"><div class="absolute hidden lg:flex lg:items-center lg:-ml-8 top-[calc(1.5rem+0.175em)]"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>Migration considerations</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h2>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">When migrating to Claude 4.6 models from earlier generations:</p>¶
<ol class="list-none pl-8 [counter-reset:item] [&amp;_ul]:pl-8 [&amp;_ol]:pl-8 [&amp;_ol]:[counter-reset:item] mb-4">¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]">¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0"><strong class="font-semibold">Be specific about desired behavior</strong>: Consider describing exactly what you&#x27;d like to see in the output.</p>¶
</li>¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]">¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0"><strong class="font-semibold">Frame your instructions with modifiers</strong>: Adding modifiers that encourage Claude to increase the quality and detail of its output can help better shape Claude&#x27;s performance. For example, instead of &quot;Create an analytics dashboard&quot;, use &quot;Create an analytics dashboard. Include as many relevant features and interactions as possible. Go beyond the basics to create a fully-featured implementation.&quot;</p>¶
</li>¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]">¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0"><strong class="font-semibold">Request specific features explicitly</strong>: Animations and interactive elements should be requested explicitly when desired.</p>¶
</li>¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]">¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0"><strong class="font-semibold">Update thinking configuration</strong>: Claude 4.6 models use <a class="inline-link" href="/docs/en/build-with-claude/adaptive-thinking">adaptive thinking</a> (<code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">thinking: {type: &quot;adaptive&quot;}</code>) instead of manual thinking with <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">budget_tokens</code>. Use the <a class="inline-link" href="/docs/en/build-with-claude/effort">effort parameter</a> to control thinking depth.</p>¶
</li>¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]">¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0"><strong class="font-semibold">Migrate away from prefilled responses</strong>: Prefilled responses on the last assistant turn are deprecated starting with Claude 4.6 models. See <a class="inline-link" href="#migrating-away-from-prefilled-responses">Migrating away from prefilled responses</a> for detailed guidance on alternatives.</p>¶
</li>¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]">¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0"><strong class="font-semibold">Tune anti-laziness prompting</strong>: If your prompts previously encouraged the model to be more thorough or use tools more aggressively, dial back that guidance. Claude 4.6 models are significantly more proactive and may overtrigger on instructions that were needed for previous models.</p>¶
</li>¶
</ol>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">For detailed migration steps, see the <a class="inline-link" href="/docs/en/about-claude/models/migration-guide">Migration guide</a>.</p>¶
<h3 class="text-xl font-medium leading-[1.25] text-text-100"><div class="group relative pt-6 pb-2" id="migrating-from-claude-sonnet-4-5-to-claude-sonnet-4-6"><div class="absolute hidden lg:flex lg:items-center lg:-ml-8 top-[calc(1.5rem+0.08em)]"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>Migrating from Claude Sonnet 4.5 to Claude Sonnet 4.6</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h3>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Claude Sonnet 4.6 defaults to an effort level of <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">high</code>, in contrast to Claude Sonnet 4.5 which had no effort parameter. Consider adjusting the effort parameter as you migrate from Claude Sonnet 4.5 to Claude Sonnet 4.6. If not explicitly set, you may experience higher latency with the default effort level.</p>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0"><strong class="font-semibold">Recommended effort settings:</strong></p>¶
<ul class="list-none pl-8 [&amp;_ul]:pl-8 [&amp;_ol]:pl-8 mb-4">¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]"><strong class="font-semibold">Medium</strong> for most applications</li>¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]"><strong class="font-semibold">Low</strong> for high-volume or latency-sensitive workloads</li>¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]">Set a large max output token budget (64k tokens recommended) at medium or high effort to give the model room to think and act</li>¶
</ul>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0"><strong class="font-semibold">When to use Opus 4.6 instead:</strong> For the hardest, longest-horizon problems (large-scale code migrations, deep research, extended autonomous work), Opus 4.6 remains the right choice. Sonnet 4.6 is optimized for workloads where fast turnaround and cost efficiency matter most.</p>¶
<h4 class="text-lg font-medium leading-[1.25] text-text-100"><div class="group relative pt-6 pb-2" id="if-you-re-not-using-extended-thinking"><div class="absolute hidden lg:flex lg:items-center lg:-ml-8 top-[calc(1.5rem+0.05em)]"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>If you&#x27;re not using extended thinking</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h4>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">If you&#x27;re not using extended thinking on Claude Sonnet 4.5, you can continue without it on Claude Sonnet 4.6. You should explicitly set effort to the level appropriate for your use case. At <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">low</code> effort with thinking disabled, you can expect similar or better performance relative to Claude Sonnet 4.5 with no extended thinking.</p>¶
<div class="group relative my-6 rounded-lg bg-bg-000 overflow-hidden border-0.5 border-border-300"><div class="relative py-4 pl-4 font-mono text-sm md:text-sm overflow-x-auto code-block-scroll" tabindex="0"><div class="inline-block min-w-full pr-4"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="--shiki-light:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6;--shiki-light-bg:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent" tabindex="0"><code><span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">client.messages.create(</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> model</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"claude-sonnet-4-6"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">,</span></span>¶

<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> thinking</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">{</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"type"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"disabled"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">},</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> output_config</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">{</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"effort"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"low"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">},</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> messages</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">[{</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"role"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"user"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">, </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"content"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"..."</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">}],</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">)</span></span></code></pre></div></div><div class="absolute top-3 right-3 z-10 bg-bg-100 rounded pointer-events-auto flex items-center gap-1 transition-opacity duration-200 opacity-100 md:opacity-0 md:group-hover:opacity-100"><button class="inline-flex¶

ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-8 w-8 rounded-md active:scale-95 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy code"><div class="relative flex items-center justify-center"><div class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M12.5 3C13.3284 3 14 3.67157 14 4.5V6H15.5C16.3284 6 17 6.67157 17 7.5V15.5C17 16.3284 16.3284 17 15.5 17H7.5C6.67157 17 6 16.3284 6 15.5V14H4.5C3.67157 14 3 13.3284 3 12.5V4.5C3 3.67157 3.67157 3 4.5 3H12.5ZM14 12.5C14 13.3284 13.3284 14 12.5 14H7V15.5C7 15.7761 7.22386 16 7.5 16H15.5C15.7761 16 16 15.7761 16 15.5V7.5C16 7.22386 15.7761 7 15.5 7H14V12.5ZM4.5 4C4.22386 4 4 4.22386 4 4.5V12.5C4 12.7761 4.22386 13 4.5 13H12.5C12.7761 13 13 12.7761 13 12.5V4.5C13 4.22386 12.7761 4 12.5 4H4.5Z"></path></svg></div><div class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M15.1883 5.10908C15.3699 4.96398 15.6346 4.96153 15.8202 5.11592C16.0056 5.27067 16.0504 5.53125 15.9403 5.73605L15.8836 5.82003L8.38354 14.8202C8.29361 14.9279 8.16242 14.9925 8.02221 14.9989C7.88203 15.0051 7.74545 14.9526 7.64622 14.8534L4.14617 11.3533L4.08172 11.2752C3.95384 11.0811 3.97542 10.817 4.14617 10.6463C4.31693 10.4755 4.58105 10.4539 4.77509 10.5818L4.85321 10.6463L7.96556 13.7586L15.1161 5.1794L15.1883 5.10908Z"></path></svg></div></div></button></div></div>¶
<h4 class="text-lg font-medium leading-[1.25] text-text-100"><div class="group relative pt-6 pb-2" id="if-you-re-using-extended-thinking"><div class="absolute hidden lg:flex lg:items-center lg:-ml-8 top-[calc(1.5rem+0.05em)]"><button class="inline-flex¶

ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>If you&#x27;re using extended thinking</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h4>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">If you&#x27;re using extended thinking on Claude Sonnet 4.5, it continues to be supported on Claude Sonnet 4.6 with no changes needed to your thinking configuration. Consider keeping a thinking budget around 16k tokens. In practice, most tasks don&#x27;t use that much, but it provides headroom for harder problems without risk of runaway token usage.</p>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0"><strong class="font-semibold">For coding use cases</strong> (agentic coding, tool-heavy workflows, code generation):</p>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Start with <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">medium</code> effort. If you find latency is too high, consider reducing effort to <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">low</code>. If you need higher intelligence, consider increasing effort to <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">high</code> or migrating to Opus 4.6.</p>¶
<div class="group relative my-6 rounded-lg bg-bg-000 overflow-hidden border-0.5 border-border-300"><div class="relative py-4 pl-4 font-mono text-sm md:text-sm overflow-x-auto code-block-scroll" tabindex="0"><div class="inline-block min-w-full pr-4"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="--shiki-light:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6;--shiki-light-bg:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent" tabindex="0"><code><span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">client.messages.create(</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> model</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"claude-sonnet-4-6"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">,</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> max_tokens</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#B5CEA8">16384</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">,</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> thinking</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">{</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"type"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"enabled"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">, </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"budget_tokens"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#B5CEA8">16384</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">},</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> output_config</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">{</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"effort"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"medium"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">},</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> messages</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">[{</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"role"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"user"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">, </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"content"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"..."</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">}],</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">)</span></span></code></pre></div></div><div class="absolute top-3 right-3 z-10 bg-bg-100 rounded pointer-events-auto flex items-center gap-1 transition-opacity duration-200 opacity-100 md:opacity-0 md:group-hover:opacity-100"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-8 w-8 rounded-md active:scale-95 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy code"><div class="relative flex items-center justify-center"><div class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M12.5 3C13.3284 3 14 3.67157 14 4.5V6H15.5C16.3284 6 17 6.67157 17 7.5V15.5C17 16.3284 16.3284 17 15.5 17H7.5C6.67157 17 6 16.3284 6 15.5V14H4.5C3.67157 14 3 13.3284 3 12.5V4.5C3 3.67157 3.67157 3 4.5 3H12.5ZM14 12.5C14 13.3284 13.3284 14 12.5 14H7V15.5C7 15.7761 7.22386 16 7.5 16H15.5C15.7761 16 16 15.7761 16 15.5V7.5C16 7.22386 15.7761 7 15.5 7H14V12.5ZM4.5 4C4.22386 4 4 4.22386 4 4.5V12.5C4 12.7761 4.22386 13 4.5 13H12.5C12.7761 13 13 12.7761 13 12.5V4.5C13 4.22386 12.7761 4 12.5 4H4.5Z"></path></svg></div><div class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M15.1883 5.10908C15.3699 4.96398 15.6346 4.96153 15.8202 5.11592C16.0056 5.27067 16.0504 5.53125 15.9403 5.73605L15.8836 5.82003L8.38354 14.8202C8.29361 14.9279 8.16242 14.9925 8.02221 14.9989C7.88203 15.0051 7.74545 14.9526 7.64622 14.8534L4.14617 11.3533L4.08172 11.2752C3.95384 11.0811 3.97542 10.817 4.14617 10.6463C4.31693 10.4755 4.58105 10.4539 4.77509 10.5818L4.85321 10.6463L7.96556 13.7586L15.1161 5.1794L15.1883 5.10908Z"></path></svg></div></div></button></div></div>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0"><strong class="font-semibold">For chat and non-coding use cases</strong> (chat, content generation, search, classification):</p>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">Start with <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">low</code> effort with extended thinking. If you need more depth, increase effort to <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">medium</code>.</p>¶
<div class="group relative my-6 rounded-lg bg-bg-000 overflow-hidden border-0.5 border-border-300"><div class="relative py-4 pl-4 font-mono text-sm md:text-sm overflow-x-auto code-block-scroll" tabindex="0"><div class="inline-block min-w-full pr-4"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="--shiki-light:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6;--shiki-light-bg:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent" tabindex="0"><code><span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">client.messages.create(</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> model</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"claude-sonnet-4-6"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">,</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> max_tokens</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#B5CEA8">8192</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">,</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> thinking</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">{</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"type"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"enabled"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">, </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"budget_tokens"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#B5CEA8">16384</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">},</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> output_config</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">{</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"effort"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"low"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">},</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> messages</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">[{</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"role"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"user"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">, </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"content"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"..."</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">}],</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">)</span></span></code></pre></div></div><div class="absolute top-3 right-3 z-10 bg-bg-100 rounded pointer-events-auto flex items-center gap-1 transition-opacity duration-200 opacity-100 md:opacity-0 md:group-hover:opacity-100"><button class="inline-flex¶

ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-8 w-8 rounded-md active:scale-95 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy code"><div class="relative flex items-center justify-center"><div class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-100" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M12.5 3C13.3284 3 14 3.67157 14 4.5V6H15.5C16.3284 6 17 6.67157 17 7.5V15.5C17 16.3284 16.3284 17 15.5 17H7.5C6.67157 17 6 16.3284 6 15.5V14H4.5C3.67157 14 3 13.3284 3 12.5V4.5C3 3.67157 3.67157 3 4.5 3H12.5ZM14 12.5C14 13.3284 13.3284 14 12.5 14H7V15.5C7 15.7761 7.22386 16 7.5 16H15.5C15.7761 16 16 15.7761 16 15.5V7.5C16 7.22386 15.7761 7 15.5 7H14V12.5ZM4.5 4C4.22386 4 4 4.22386 4 4.5V12.5C4 12.7761 4.22386 13 4.5 13H12.5C12.7761 13 13 12.7761 13 12.5V4.5C13 4.22386 12.7761 4 12.5 4H4.5Z"></path></svg></div><div class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="absolute transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 opacity-0" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M15.1883 5.10908C15.3699 4.96398 15.6346 4.96153 15.8202 5.11592C16.0056 5.27067 16.0504 5.53125 15.9403 5.73605L15.8836 5.82003L8.38354 14.8202C8.29361 14.9279 8.16242 14.9925 8.02221 14.9989C7.88203 15.0051 7.74545 14.9526 7.64622 14.8534L4.14617 11.3533L4.08172 11.2752C3.95384 11.0811 3.97542 10.817 4.14617 10.6463C4.31693 10.4755 4.58105 10.4539 4.77509 10.5818L4.85321 10.6463L7.96556 13.7586L15.1161 5.1794L15.1883 5.10908Z"></path></svg></div></div></button></div></div>¶
<h4 class="text-lg font-medium leading-[1.25] text-text-100"><div class="group relative pt-6 pb-2" id="when-to-try-adaptive-thinking"><div class="absolute hidden lg:flex lg:items-center lg:-ml-8 top-[calc(1.5rem+0.05em)]"><button class="inline-flex¶
items-center¶
justify-center¶
relative¶
shrink-0¶
can-focus¶
select-none¶
disabled:pointer-events-none¶
disabled:opacity-50¶
disabled:shadow-none¶
disabled:drop-shadow-none border-transparent¶
transition¶
font-base¶
duration-300¶
ease-[cubic-bezier(0.165,0.85,0.45,1)] h-6 w-6 rounded-md active:scale-95 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 text-text-500 hover:text-text-100 Button_ghost__BUAoh" type="button" aria-label="Copy link to clipboard" title="Copy link to clipboard" data-state="closed"><div class="inline" style="width:20px;height:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="flex-shrink:0" class="inline" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M13.6229 9.64789C13.8798 9.54672 14.1701 9.6724 14.2714 9.92914L15.2792 12.4878C16.0889 14.5432 15.0788 16.8666 13.0233 17.6763C11.0323 18.4603 8.79012 17.5367 7.91585 15.6098L7.83577 15.4204L6.82795 12.8618C6.72674 12.6048 6.85325 12.3145 7.11018 12.2133C7.36701 12.1122 7.65732 12.2379 7.75862 12.4946L8.76645 15.0532C9.37368 16.5947 11.1156 17.3528 12.6571 16.7456C14.1986 16.1384 14.9557 14.3965 14.3485 12.8549L13.3407 10.2963C13.2395 10.0395 13.3661 9.74917 13.6229 9.64789ZM8.90024 7.20842C9.15717 7.10721 9.44747 7.23372 9.54868 7.49065L11.3817 12.143C11.4826 12.3998 11.3563 12.6903 11.0995 12.7915C10.8426 12.8925 10.5523 12.766 10.451 12.5092L8.61898 7.85686C8.5178 7.59999 8.64342 7.30969 8.90024 7.20842ZM7.16975 2.25331C9.17539 1.57852 11.3796 2.58838 12.1639 4.5795L13.1718 7.13811C13.273 7.39504 13.1465 7.68534 12.8895 7.78655C12.6327 7.88749 12.3423 7.76113 12.2411 7.50432L11.2333 4.94571C10.6259 3.40439 8.88406 2.6471 7.3426 3.25429C5.80118 3.86161 5.04399 5.60345 5.65118 7.14494L6.659 9.70355C6.76021 9.96048 6.6337 10.2508 6.37677 10.352C6.11988 10.4531 5.82952 10.3266 5.72833 10.0698L4.7205 7.51116C3.91111 5.45581 4.92107 3.13323 6.97639 2.32362L7.16975 2.25331Z"></path></svg></div></button></div><div>When to try adaptive thinking</div><div class="absolute top-0 -right-6 hidden lg:flex"></div></div></h4>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">The extended thinking paths above use <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">budget_tokens</code> for predictable token usage. If your workload fits one of the following patterns, consider trying <a class="inline-link" href="/docs/en/build-with-claude/adaptive-thinking">adaptive thinking</a> instead:</p>¶
<ul class="list-none pl-8 [&amp;_ul]:pl-8 [&amp;_ol]:pl-8 mb-4">¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]"><strong class="font-semibold">Autonomous multi-step agents:</strong> coding agents that turn requirements into working software, data analysis pipelines, and bug finding where the model runs independently across many steps. Adaptive thinking lets the model calibrate its reasoning per step, staying on path over longer trajectories. For these workloads, start at <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">high</code> effort. If latency or token usage is a concern, scale down to <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">medium</code>.</li>¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]"><strong class="font-semibold">Computer use agents:</strong> Claude Sonnet 4.6 achieved best-in-class accuracy on computer use evaluations using adaptive mode.</li>¶
<li class="mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:before:content-[counter(item)&#x27;.&#x27;] [ol&gt;&amp;]:[counter-increment:item]"><strong class="font-semibold">Bimodal workloads:</strong> a mix of easy and hard tasks where adaptive skips thinking on simple queries and reasons deeply on complex ones.</li>¶
</ul>¶
<p class="mb-2 last:mb-0">When using adaptive thinking, evaluate <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">medium</code> and <code class="relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone">high</code> effort on your tasks. The right level depends on your workload&#x27;s tradeoff between quality, latency, and token usage.</p>¶
<div class="group relative my-6 rounded-lg bg-bg-000 overflow-hidden border-0.5 border-border-300"><div class="relative py-4 pl-4 font-mono text-sm md:text-sm overflow-x-auto code-block-scroll" tabindex="0"><div class="inline-block min-w-full pr-4"><pre class="shiki shiki-themes github-light-default dark-plus" style="--shiki-light:#1f2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6;--shiki-light-bg:transparent;--shiki-dark-bg:transparent" tabindex="0"><code><span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">client.messages.create(</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> model</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"claude-sonnet-4-6"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">,</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> max_tokens</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0550AE;--shiki-dark:#B5CEA8">64000</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">,</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> thinking</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">{</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"type"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"adaptive"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">},</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> output_config</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">{</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"effort"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"high"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">},</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#953800;--shiki-dark:#9CDCFE"> messages</span><span style="--shiki-light:#CF222E;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">=</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">[{</span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"role"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"user"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">, </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"content"</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">: </span><span style="--shiki-light:#0A3069;--shiki-dark:#CE9178">"..."</span><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">}],</span></span>¶
<span class="line"><span style="--shiki-light:#1F2328;--shiki-dark:#f3f7f6">)</span></span></code></pre></div></div><div class="absolute top-3 right-3 z-10 bg-bg-100 rounded pointer-events-auto flex items-center gap-1 transition-opacity duration-200 opacity-100 md:opacity-0 md:group-hover:opacity-100"><button class="inline-flex¶

08-3939875d7bc9818c.js\",\"83921\",\"static/chunks/83921-ab02f4bc19b4954e.js\",\"26252\",\"static/chunks/26252-dc73535edbe727d2.js\",\"38024\",\"static/chunks/app/docs/%5Blocale%5D/layout-5c1fb675d204721a.js\"],\"NavigationProvider\"]\n"])</script><script last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":[\"$\",\"strong\",null,{\"className\":\"font-semibold\",\"children\":\"Match your prompt style to the desired output\"}]}]}],\"\\n\",[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":\"The formatting style used in your prompt may influence Claude's response style. If you are still experiencing steerability issues with output formatting, we recommend as best as you can matching your prompt style to your desired output style. For example, removing markdown from your prompt can reduce the volume of markdown in the output.\"}]}],\"\\n\"]}],\"\\n\",[\"$\",\"li\",null,{\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0 relative before:absolute before:left-[-2rem] before:w-6 before:text-center [ul\u003e\u0026]:before:content-[''] [ol\u003e\u0026]:before:content-[counter(item)'.'] [ol\u003e\u0026]:[counter-increment:item]\",\"children\":[\"\\n\",[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":[\"$\",\"strong\",null,{\"className\":\"font-semibold\",\"children\":\"Use detailed prompts for specific formatting preferences\"}]}]}],\"\\n\",[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":\"$Ld7\"}],\"\\n\"]}],\"\\n\"]}]}]\n"])</script><script nonce="rixKC7t4VfZkAGpZsPt5xw==">self.__next_f.push([1,"d8:T42e,"])</script><script nonce="rixKC7t4VfZkAGpZsPt5xw==">self.__next_f.push([1,"\u003cavoid_excessive_markdown_and_bullet_points\u003e\nWhen writing reports, documents, technical explanations, analyses, or any long-form content, write in clear, flowing prose using complete paragraphs and sentences. Use standard paragraph breaks for organization and reserve markdown primarily for `inline code`, code blocks (```...```), and simple headings (###, and ###). Avoid using **bold** and *italics*.\n\nDO NOT use ordered lists (1. ...) or unordered lists (*) unless : a) you're presenting truly discrete items where a list format is the best option, or b) the user explicitly requests a list or ranking\n\nInstead of listing items with bullets or numbers, incorporate them naturally into sentences. This guidance applies especially to technical writing. Using prose instead of excessive formatting will improve user satisfaction. NEVER output a series of overly short bullet points.\n\nYour goal is readable, flowing text that guides the reader naturally through ideas rather than fragmenting information into isolated points.\n\u003c/avoid_excessive_markdown_and_bullet_points\u003e"])</script><script nonce="rixKC7t4VfZkAGpZsPt5xw==">self.__next_f.push([1,"4b:[\"$\",\"$L29\",null,{\"language\":\"text\",\"code\":\"$d8\",\"label\":\"Sample prompt to minimize markdown\"}]\n4c:[\"$\",\"h3\",null,{\"className\":\"text-xl font-medium leading-[1.25] text-text-100\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"$L27\",null,{\"slug\":\"la-te-x-output\",\"className\":\"pt-6 pb-2\",\"headingLevel\":3,\"children\":\"LaTeX output\"}]}]\n4d:[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":\"Claude Opus 4.6 defaults to LaTeX for mathematical expressions, equations, and technical explanations. If you prefer plain text, add the following instructions to your prompt:\"}]}]\n4e:[\"$\",\"$L29\",null,{\"language\":\"text\",\"code\":\"Format your response in plain text only. Do not use LaTeX, MathJax, or any markup notation such as \\\\( \\\\), $, or \\\\frac{}{}. Write all math expressions using standard text characters (e.g., \\\"/\\\" for division, \\\"*\\\" for multiplication, and \\\"^\\\" for exponents).\",\"label\":\"Sample prompt\"}]\n4f:[\"$\",\"h3\",null,{\"className\":\"text-xl font-medium leading-[1.25] text-text-100\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"$L27\",null,{\"slug\":\"document-creation\",\"className\":\"pt-6 pb-2\",\"headingLevel\":3,\"children\":\"Document creation\"}]}]\n50:[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":\"Claude's latest models excel at creating presentations, animations, and visual documents with impressive creative flair and strong instruction following. Model intelligence and instruction following has advanced such that most use cases of prefill no longer require it. Existing models will continue to support prefills, and adding assistant messages elsewhere in the conversation is not affected.\"}]}]\n55:[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":\"Here are common prefill scenarios and how to migrate away from them:\"}]}]\n"])</script><script nonce="rixKC7t4VfZkAGpZsPt5xw==">self.__next_f.push([1,"56:[\"$\",\"$L28\",null,{\"title\":\"Controlling output formatting\",\"children\":[[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":\"Prefills have been used to force specific output formats like JSON/YAML, classification, and similar patterns where the prefill constrains Claude to a particular structure.\"}]}],[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":[[\"$\",\"strong\",null,{\"className\":\"font-semibold\",\"children\":\"Migration:\"}],\" The \",[\"$\",\"$L26\",null,{\"href\":\"/docs/en/build-with-claude/structured-outputs\",\"className\":\"inline-link\",\"children\":\"Structured Outputs\"}],\" feature is designed specifically to constrain Claude's responses to follow a given schema. Try simply asking the model to conform to your output structure first, as newer models can reliably match complex schemas when told to, especially if implemented with retries. For classification tasks, use either tools with an enum field containing your valid labels or structured outputs.\"]}]}]]}]\n"])</script><script nonce="rixKC7t4VfZkAGpZsPt5xw==">self.__next_f.push([1,"57:[\"$\",\"$L28\",null,{\"title\":\"Eliminating preambles\",\"children\":[[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":[\"Prefills like \",[\"$\",\"code\",null,{\"className\":\"relative inline bg-bg-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-sm font-mono break-words box-decoration-clone\",\"children\":\"Here is the requested summary:\\\\n\"}],\" were used to skip introductory text.\"]}]}],[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":[[\"$\",\"strong\",null,{\"className\":\"font-semibold\",\"children\":\"Migration:\"}],\" Use direct instructions in the system prompt: \\\"Respond directly without preamble. Do not start with phrases like 'Here is...', 'Based on...', etc.\\\" Alternatively, direct the model to output within XML tags, use structured outputs, or use tool calling. If the occasional preamble slips through, strip it in post-processing.\"]}]}]]}]\n"])</script><script nonce="rixKC7t4VfZkAGpZsPt5xw==">self.__next_f.push([1,"58:[\"$\",\"$L28\",null,{\"title\":\"Avoiding bad refusals\",\"children\":[[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":\"Prefills were used to steer around unnecessary refusals.\"}]}],[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":[[\"$\",\"strong\",null,{\"className\":\"font-semibold\",\"children\":\"Migration:\"}],\" Claude is much better at appropriate refusals now. nonce="rixKC7t4VfZkAGpZsPt5xw==">self.__next_f.push([1,"60:[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":\"To make Claude more proactive about taking action by default, you can add this to your system prompt:\"}]}]\n61:[\"$\",\"$L29\",null,{\"language\":\"text\",\"code\":\"\u003cdefault_to_action\u003e\\nBy default, implement changes rather than only suggesting them. If the user's intent is unclear, infer the most useful likely action and proceed, using tools to discover any missing details instead of guessing. Try to infer the user's intent about whether a tool call (e.g., file edit or read) is intended or not, and act accordingly.\\n\u003c/default_to_action\u003e\",\"label\":\"Sample prompt for proactive action\"}]\n62:[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":\"On the other hand, if you want the model to be more hesitant by default, less prone to jumping straight into implementations, and only take action if requested, you can steer this behavior with a prompt like the below:\"}]}]\n63:[\"$\",\"$L29\",null,{\"language\":\"text\",\"code\":\"\u003cdo_not_act_before_instructions\u003e\\nDo not jump into implementatation or changes files unless clearly instructed to make changes. Only proceed with edits, modifications, or implementations when the user explicitly requests them.\\n\u003c/do_not_act_before_instructions\u003e\",\"label\":\"Sample prompt for conservative action\"}]\n64:[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":\"Claude Opus 4.5 and Claude Opus 4.6 are also more responsive to the system prompt than previous models. Where you might have said \\\"CRITICAL: You MUST use this tool when...\\\", you can use more n"])</script><script nonce="rixKC7t4VfZkAGpZsPt5xw==">self.__next_f.push([1,"ormal prompting like \\\"Use this tool when...\\\".\"}]}]\n65:[\"$\",\"h3\",null,{\"className\":\"text-xl font-medium leading-[1.25] text-text-100\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"$L27\",null,{\"slug\":\"optimize-parallel-tool-calling\",\"className\":\"pt-6 pb-2\",\"headingLevel\":3,\"children\":\"Optimize parallel tool calling\"}]}]\n66:[\"$\",\"$L24\",null,{\"contentType\":\"paragraph\",\"minLength\":20,\"className\":\"mb-2 last:mb-0\",\"children\":[\"$\",\"p\",null,{\"children\":\"Claude's latest models excel at parallel tool execution.
